definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Look at the Hughes. This is line eighty of Samson.
sentences.chinese: 看到休斯版本描寫參孫的第80行。

sentences.english: As soon as the people saw him, they brought thirty companions to be with him.
sentences.chinese: 衆人看見參孫，就請了三十個人陪伴他。

sentences.english: What is the major lesson for us from Samson's life?
sentences.chinese: 我們從參孫身上學到甚麼重要的教訓呢？

sentences.english: After this he loved a woman in the Valley of Sorek, whose name was Delilah.
sentences.chinese: 後來，參孫在梭烈谷喜愛一個婦人，名叫大利拉。

sentences.english: She brought the final temptation into Samson's life.
sentences.chinese: 她爲參孫帶來最厲害的試探。

sentences.english: This is page 238 of the Hughes, Book Two, line 249.
sentences.chinese: 力士參孫》的第238頁，第二冊，第249行。

sentences.english: So, tried brother, cheer your heart with Samson's words, and rest assured that God will deliver you ere long.
sentences.chinese: 以參孫的話振作你心，堅信不久上帝必解救你。

sentences.english: This is page 728 in the Hughes, the right-hand column.
sentences.chinese: 在《力士參孫》的第728頁，右邊一欄。

sentences.english: The woman gave birth to a boy and named him Samson.
sentences.chinese: 後來婦人生了一個兒子，給他起名叫參孫。

sentences.english: And it came to pass afterward, that he loved a woman in the valley of Sorek, whose name was Delilah.
sentences.chinese: 後來參孫在梭烈谷喜愛一個婦人，名叫大利拉。

sentences.english: I want the beating palms to cry out for Samson.
sentences.chinese: 我要那鞭笞用的棕櫚，來爲參孫放聲痛哭。

sentences.english: God gave Samson a wonderful beginning and many remarkable blessings.
sentences.chinese: 但神給予參孫一個美好的童年和特殊的祝福。

sentences.english: Samson then spends the rest of his life in humiliation.
sentences.chinese: 參孫在羞辱中度過了他一生餘下的日子。

sentences.english: Now the temple was crowded with men and women; all the rulers of the Philistines were there, and on the roof were about three thousand men and women watching Samson perform.
sentences.chinese: 房的平頂上約有三千男女，觀看參孫戲耍。

sentences.english: I sighed a sigh of relief when he brought peace to us for the next twenty years.
sentences.chinese: 我很感嘆是參孫帶給我們接下來二十年的和平日子。

sentences.english: But Samson's wife was given to his companion, whom he had used as his friend.
sentences.chinese: 參孫的妻便歸了參孫的陪伴，就是作過他朋友的。

definition: Wu Han (1909-1969), historian, author of biography of Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋, hounded to his death together with several members of his family during the cultural revolution
Jonathan D Spence (1936-), distinguished British US historian of China, author of The search for modern China 追尋現代中國|追寻现代中国
Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
Song Dynasty History of Zen Buddhism in China (1252), 20 scrolls

Prime tortoise of the record bureau, Song dynasty historical encyclopedia of political essays, autobiography, memorials and decrees, compiled 1005-1013 under Wang Qinruo 王欽若|王钦若 and Yang Yi 楊億|杨亿, 1000 scrolls
Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
History of the Liao Dynasty, twenty first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 116 scrolls
Yi Zhuan, commentary on the "Book of Changes" or "I Ching" 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
